title: Image
description: This is image (normal and image slider) component.

prop.name: src
prop.description: Image source or list of image sources.

prop.name: alt
prop.description: Alt of image. If src prop is list of images, you can use list of alts here.

prop.name: showButtons
prop.description: Show next/prev buttons on next to slider.

prop.name: interval
prop.description: Miliseconds time to automatic change the slide. If it's 0, it does not apply.
